page.title: 06SALISBURY PLAIN WEATHER.
page.content: We enjoy a fairly stable climate in our area and temperatures vary from -10C in Winter to +80C during the Summer months. Our weather is very mixed. Spring is normally cool, wet and windy with some pleasant sunny days. The last two Summers have been hot and dry, with little rainfall, but this year has been a wet cool one with plenty of windy days. In contrast our Autumn has been warm, sunny and dry with little or no rain. The first frost of Winter came at the end of October along with fog patches. During the Winter, we normally expect some snow to fall, and when heavy falls occur, drifting snow off the fields soon blocks off the roads, and the area could be cut off for a few days.
